channel.title: [PI] ::xteletome command DC's?

item.title: [PI] ::xteletome command DC's?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

What does it say in the run cmd?

Try this.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome")) { try { String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName); c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ::xteletome command DC's?
item.dc:creator: @Mage_mad_nes Mage mad nes
item.description:
@Mage_mad_nes wrote:

Hey whenever a staff member of mine or I type ::teletome (playername) it will disconnect you… It teleports the player to you though after you disconnect, i dont understand the issue any help would be appreciated, below is my command for ::teletome…

} } if (playerCommand.startsWith("teletome")) { try { String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(9); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName); c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); } }

Read full topic
